item.title: Emacs Org mode source blocks
item.description: Intro It's time to start documenting how I use Emacs org mode (from now on org) and it will contain a serie of posts. This is the first post and it will cover source blocks. One of Emacs many killing features is org. To describe it fairly wide it's like markdown on steroids, with extensions. You can write headings and subheadings to create levels of sections.
